name: TrainCounterToFile
title: Train Counter to File Mod
author: Eastborn
description: Mod find trains by them starting or stopping and will write the amount of trains to a file ('%Factorio%/script-output/stream_data/train_amount.txt')
description_original: Mod find trains by them starting or stopping and will write the amount of trains to a file ('%Factorio%/script-output/stream_data/train_amount.txt')
